name: Synchrosomnia (DEMO)
description:
Keyboard CONTROLS \\ Touchscreen CONTROLS:
Z \\ Tap = Confirm
Shift \\ (Automatic) = Run
X \\ Double finger tap = Menu
Directional keys \\ Tap = Movement

-------

Synchrosomnia [singk-row-som-nee-uh]

noun;

1. Describes the condition in which two or more entities share the same sleep cycle, including REM (dream) cycles, on a given night or longer. Can occur naturally, but very rare outside of lab conditions.

-------

From right to left.

From birth to death.

From seed to bloom.

From me to you.

-------

Enjoy this extremely early demo! Feedback needed & appreciated! It took me around a week to put this together, & I can't wait to continue it.
